SEARCH
Package mvc

Class UserData

java.lang.Object
mvc.UserData
public class UserData extends Object
This model class stores a user's progress in the game. It loads/saves data using the user's data file. The user's ProgressionData (per stage) is stored as separate objects.
Since:
Mar 14, 2024
Version:
1.3
Author:
Eunhak Kim, Chun Ho Chan (Edward)

  • Constructor Details

    • UserData

      public UserData(UserTypeEnum userType, String username, String password)
      Construct a user data entry.
      Parameters:
      userType - Type of user
      username - Account name of user
      password - Account password of user

  • Method Details

    • importData

      public static UserData importData(String filename)
      Decode the encoded data stored in a user data file.
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename of the user data (prefix + username + suffix)
      Returns:
      UserData, or null if the file does not exist.
      See Also:
      • for details.

    • exportData

      public void exportData()
      Export this user's data to the user data file. The first line contains user information and total statistics. The lines after each contain detailed per-stage statistics.

      Format: (without spaces)
      "userType, username, password, totalScore, totalTimeSpent, totalAttempts"
      "progressionData1"
      "progressionData2"
      "..."

    • toFilename

      public static String toFilename(String username)
      Convert username to the filename of this user's data file.
      Parameters:
      username - Username
      Returns:
      Filename of that user data (prefix + username + suffix)
